dsense.name: statement
dsense.guideword: (to press, public) (面对新闻媒体、公众等)

example.eg: The police are going to make a statement.
The statement says that I have fifty dollars in my account.
example.egtrans: 银行结算单显示，我账户里还有五十美金。

example.eg: The witness's statement helped to convict the criminal.
example.egtrans: 证人的陈述帮助法庭给嫌疑人定了罪。

example.eg: The clothes she wears really make a statement about who she is.
example.egtrans: 她的衣着完全表现出了她的身份。

example.eg: I'll check my bank statement to see if you cashed my cheque.
example.egtrans: 我会去检查银行对账单，来看你有没有兑现我的支票。

example.eg: Lawyers for the prosecution and the defense gave their closing statements today.
The FBI issued a statement denying that the journalist was under investigation.
Workers must follow the method statement.
As described in our mission statement, we aim to help those in need by donating profits to charity.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 任务宣言, 使命宣言

dsense.name: mission statement
dsense.guideword: (formal definition of a company's aims) (指企业)

example.eg: I cannot appear in court but I am willing to provide a notarised statement.

dsense.name: personal statement
dsense.guideword: (university admissions essay) (申请大学时需提供的文件)

example.eg: Be sure to write a unique and eloquent personal statement when you apply for graduate school.

dsense.name: statement of purpose
dsense.guideword: (part of university application) (大学入学申请的一部分)

dsense.name: statement of purpose
dsense.guideword: (written summary of one's career aims) (职业目标书面概要)

dsense.name: statement of work
dsense.guideword: (document stating scope of a job or task)

example.eg: If you make a false statement under oath, you can be charged with perjury.
According to her sworn statement, she was not in the house at the time of the murder.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 论文中心思想, 论文陈述
